content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the google command to search for hiking trails near Brno and received a list of results. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on the Brno Reservoir trail. I also tested my internet connection using execute_python_code and pinged google.com successfully. Lastly, I attempted to browse the website of the city of Brno for information on the Brno Reservoir trail, but the page could not be found. 

In the latest development, I used the web_search command to find the location of Stara Pradelna house and the google command to find the best hiking trails near Brno. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on Stara Pradelna, a restaurant and accommodation located near Veveří Castle in Brno. The restaurant offers Czech cuisine, salads, and homemade desserts, and the accommodation is a two-room apartment in a renovated castle laundry building.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b'Atlas\nMiniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh\nMiniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.1\nMiniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.2\nMiniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.3\nMiniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.4\nSouth_American_rivers.txt\nadventures.txt\natlas.json\natlas.settings.yaml\natlas.yaml\natlas_plans.txt\nbrno_reservoir_trail.py\ncalculate_distance.py\nfile_logger.txt\nlake_creation.txt\nlocations.txt\nnew_directory\nnew_file.txt\nnorway_kayaking.txt\noptions.txt\npacking_list.txt\nriver.txt\nriver_data\nriver_restoration_summary.txt\nriver_restoration_techniques.txt\ntop_kayaking_routes.txt\ntop_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt\n'
STDERR:
b''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "atlas.yaml"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: {'ai_goals': ['explore the world'], 'ai_name': 'Atlas', 'ai_role': 'Atlas is a Tiny Little Adventuring Soul'}", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import googlemaps\n\n# Define the API Key\napi_key = \"YOUR_API_KEY\"\n\n# Define the Client\nclient = googlemaps.Client(api_key)\n\n# Define the Location\nlocation = \"Brno, Czech Republic\"\n\n# Define the Search Query\nsearch_query = \"hiking trails\"\n\n# Define the Radius (in meters)\nradius = 10000\n\n# Define the Type of Place\nplace_type = \"park\"\n\n# Define the Fields to Retrieve\nfields = [\"name\", \"formatted_address\", \"geometry\", \"rating\", \"types\"]\n\n# Perform a Nearby Search\nplaces = client.places_nearby(location=location, keyword=search_query, radius=radius, type=place_type, fields=fields)\n\n# Print the Results\nfor place in places[\"results\"]:\n    print(place[\"name\"] + \" - \" + place[\"formatted_address\"])\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_python_code returned: Error: execute_python_code() missing 1 required positional argument: 'name'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b'total 357708\ndrwxr-xr-x 6 root root       81 Jun 13 19:37 Atlas\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 73134376 Apr 24 14:26 Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 73134376 Apr 24 14:26 Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.1\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 73134376 Apr 24 14:26 Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.2\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 73134376 Apr 24 14:26 Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.3\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 73134376 Apr 24 14:26 Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh.4\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      620 Jun 21 12:53 South_American_rivers.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      352 Jun 13 22:01 adventures.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   522440 Jun 21 13:24 atlas.json\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm      1418 Jun 21 12:35 atlas.settings.yaml\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm        95 Jun 19 11:20 atlas.yaml\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      236 Jun 19 11:22 atlas_plans.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      486 Jun 21 12:42 brno_reservoir_trail.py\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root       52 Jun 19 11:55 calculate_distance.py\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     3322 Jun 21 13:26 file_logger.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      326 Jun 13 21:58 lake_creation.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     2304 Jun 21 11:46 locations.txt\ndrwxr-xr-x 2 root root        6 Jun 13 22:19 new_directory\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root       55 Jun 21 13:26 new_file.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      226 Jun 13 22:02 norway_kayaking.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      140 Jun 13 21:29 options.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      277 Jun 21 12:37 packing_list.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root       56 Jun 13 21:53 river.txt\ndrwxr-xr-x 2 root root        6 Jun 13 21:54 river_data\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      690 Jun 13 21:56 river_restoration_summary.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      653 Jun 13 21:49 river_restoration_techniques.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      528 Jun 13 22:14 top_kayaking_routes.txt\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      294 Jun 13 22:15 top_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt\n'

    },
    {
        "title": "The Best Boston Attractions | Things to Do in Boston - Time Out",
        "href": "https://www.timeout.com/boston/things-to-do/best-boston-attractions",
        "body": "Camila Karalyte Thursday January 26 2023 Boston has a whole host of amazing attractions to suit every individual. From storied landmarks to world-class museums, there's a range of experiences..."
    },

        "title": "An insider's guide to Boston's top attractions - The Points Guy",

        "body": "A trip to this museum is especially fun for kids since costumed actors reenact the Boston Tea Party of 1773 aboard replica 18th-century ships with great zeal. Tickets are about $28 for adults and $21 for kids ages 5 to12 when purchased online. The Boston Children's Museum is just a 2-minute walk away."
    },

        "title": "15 of the best things to do in Porto - Lonely Planet",

        "body": "2- Quincy Market Tourist attractions in Boston, USA Quincy Market, completed in 1826, was designed by Alexandre Paris, a French architect. With over 20 restaurants and 40 food vendors, Quincy Market has a unique architectural style as well as delectable dining options."

]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.lonelyplanet.com", "question": "What are the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland?"}}}', type='ai_response')]
